title: 305: Developing A Healthy Relationship With Food
description: Is it possible to build muscle and be lean without resorting to crazy and unhealthy dietary habits? Not if you follow many of the standard eating recommendations put out by the fitness industry that lead to eating disorders and jeopardize long-term health. Sal, Adam & Justin go into what it takes to develop a healthy relationship with food. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week the best reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpmedia.com.
